name: spring.abnormal_change_in_throughput: ${service_name}
query: avg(last_4h):anomalies(sum:trace.spring.handler.hits{env:${env},service:${service_name}}, 'agile', 3, direction='both', interval=60, alert_window='last_15m', seasonality='weekly', timezone='utc', count_default_zero='true') >= ${throughput_critical_threshold}
message: `${service_name}` throughput deviated too much from its usual value. Runbook: ${runbook_url} Notify: ${notification_targets}
